00029 AsynchronousASG::AsynchronousASG(unsigned int seed,
00030                                  double participation_probability,
00031                                  double lambda): ActivationSequenceGenerator(),
00032                                                  time_of_next_event_(0),
00033                                                  distribution_generator_(new DistributionGenerator(seed)) {
00034     // initalize the source of randomness
00035     distribution_generator_->init_exponential(lambda); // needed for time of next event
00036     distribution_generator_->init_bernoulli(participation_probability); // needed to choose robots participating in an event
00037     distribution_generator_->init_uniform(1,6); // needed to choose type of events
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 void AsynchronousASG::initialize(const History& history, const vector<boost::shared_ptr<Robot> >& robots) {
00042 
00043     // extract robots from robot data. At start each will need a look event.
00044     BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<Robot> robot, robots) {
00045         looking_robots_.push_back(robot);
00046     }
00047 }
00048 
00049 boost::shared_ptr<Event> AsynchronousASG::get_next_event() {
00050     // 1. Choose which kind of event will be next and constructs an event of that type.
00051     boost::shared_ptr<Event> event = choose_event_type();
00052 
00053     // 2. Select the robots participating in the event. Note that the event may be empty!
00054     if(boost::shared_ptr<ComputeEvent> compute_event =
00055        boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<ComputeEvent> (event)) {
00056         list<boost::shared_ptr<Robot> >::iterator cur_robot = computing_robots_.begin();
00057         while(cur_robot != computing_robots_.end()) {
00058             if(distribution_generator_->get_value_bernoulli()) {
00059                 // add the robot to the event
00060                 compute_event->add_to_robot_subset(*cur_robot);
00061 
00062                 // should add the robot to handling_robots_ and remove it from computing_robots_
00063                 handling_robots_.push_back(*cur_robot);
00064                 cur_robot = computing_robots_.erase(cur_robot);
00065             } else {
00066                 cur_robot++;
00067             }
00068         }
00069     } else if(boost::shared_ptr<LookEvent> look_event =
00070               boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<LookEvent> (event)) {
00071         list<boost::shared_ptr<Robot> >::iterator cur_robot = looking_robots_.begin();
00072         while(cur_robot != looking_robots_.end()) {
00073             if(distribution_generator_->get_value_bernoulli()) {
00074                 // add the robot to the event
00075                 look_event->add_to_robot_subset(*cur_robot);
00076 
00077                 // remove it from looking_robots_ and add it to computing_robots_
00078                 computing_robots_.push_back(*cur_robot);
00079                 cur_robot = looking_robots_.erase(cur_robot);
00080             } else {
00081                 cur_robot++;
00082             }
00083         }
00084     } else if(boost::shared_ptr<HandleRequestsEvent> handle_requests_event =
00085               boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<HandleRequestsEvent> (event)) {
00086         list<boost::shared_ptr<Robot> >::iterator cur_robot = handling_robots_.begin();
00087         while(cur_robot != handling_robots_.end()) {
00088             if(distribution_generator_->get_value_bernoulli()) {
00089                 // get all requests for this robot
00090                 list<boost::shared_ptr<const Request> >::iterator cur_request = unhandled_request_set_.begin();
00091                 while(cur_request != unhandled_request_set_.end()) {
00092                     // if the robot issued this request: add it to the event and delete it.
00093                     // TODO(craupach) sleep about this and see if this comparison can fail.
00094                     if(&((*cur_request)->robot().id()) == &(*cur_robot)->id()) {
00095                         handle_requests_event->add_to_requests(*cur_request);
00096                         cur_request = unhandled_request_set_.erase(cur_request);
00097                     } else {
00098                         cur_request++;
00099                     }
00100                 }
00101 
00102                 // remove it from handling_robots_ and add it to looking_robots_
00103                 looking_robots_.push_back(*cur_robot);
00104                 cur_robot = handling_robots_.erase(cur_robot);
00105             }
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109     // 3. Choose the time of the next event
00110     // TODO(craupach) use geometric distribution instead.
00111     time_of_next_event_ = time_of_next_event_ + 1 + boost::numeric_cast<int>(distribution_generator_->get_value_exponential());
00112     return event;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void AsynchronousASG::update(const WorldInformation& world_information,
00116                             boost::shared_ptr<Event> last_event) {
00117     // check what kind of event we got.
00118     if(boost::shared_ptr<ComputeEvent> compute_event = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<ComputeEvent> (last_event)) {
00119         BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<const Request> cur_request, compute_event->requests()) {
00120             unhandled_request_set_.push_back(cur_request);
00121         }
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 boost::shared_ptr<Event> AsynchronousASG::choose_event_type() {
00126     if(looking_robots_.empty() && computing_robots_.empty()) {
00127         boost::shared_ptr<HandleRequestsEvent> result(new HandleRequestsEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00128         return result;
00129     } else if(looking_robots_.empty() && handling_robots_.empty()) {
00130         boost::shared_ptr<ComputeEvent> result(new ComputeEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00131         return result;
00132     } else if(computing_robots_.empty() && handling_robots_.empty()) {
00133         boost::shared_ptr<LookEvent> result(new LookEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00134         return result;
00135     } else if(looking_robots_.empty()){
00136         // choose between compute event and handle request event
00137         if(distribution_generator_->get_value_uniform() % 2 == 0) {
00138             boost::shared_ptr<ComputeEvent> result(new ComputeEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00139             return result;
00140         } else {
00141             boost::shared_ptr<HandleRequestsEvent> result(new HandleRequestsEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00142             return result;
00143         }
00144     } else if(computing_robots_.empty()) {
00145         // choose between look event and handle requests event
00146         if(distribution_generator_->get_value_uniform() % 2 == 0) {
00147             boost::shared_ptr<LookEvent> result(new LookEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00148             return result;
00149         } else {
00150             boost::shared_ptr<HandleRequestsEvent> result(new HandleRequestsEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00151             return result;
00152         }
00153     } else if(handling_robots_.empty()) {
00154         // choose between look event and compute event
00155         if(distribution_generator_->get_value_uniform() % 2 == 0) {
00156             boost::shared_ptr<LookEvent> result(new LookEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00157             return result;
00158         } else {
00159             boost::shared_ptr<ComputeEvent> result(new ComputeEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00160             return result;
00161         }
00162     } else {
00163         // choose between all three kinds of events
00164         int random = distribution_generator_->get_value_uniform() % 3;
00165         if(random == 0) {
00166             boost::shared_ptr<LookEvent> result(new LookEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00167             return result;
00168         } else if(random == 1) {
00169             boost::shared_ptr<ComputeEvent> result(new ComputeEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00170             return result;
00171         } else if(random == 2) {
00172             boost::shared_ptr<HandleRequestsEvent> result(new HandleRequestsEvent(time_of_next_event_));
00173             return result;
00174         } else {
00175             // TODO(craupach) should not happen, throw exception
00176         }
00177     }
00178 }
